comments.author: Matt Gifford
comments.message:
Flex has so many fantastic new features.

Skinning and CSS control - Rich Internet Applications should have a sleek look and feel, and more importantly, individuality.
Advanced data retrieval and sorting - the advanced data grid, remote objects, OLAP..

so much to choose from. Flex 3 really is a fantastic development environment, and one which I am enjoying learning.

comments.author: Jens
comments.message: I have to say that localization is the best feature of Flex 3. Why? Because so many more can enjoy my applications!

comments.author: James L.
comments.message:
GUI Animation was one of the important features that many website have been lack of excitement for years, when I replace some of the features with Flex applications, our user could find themselves benefits from a new web experience. Total user experience is the key point to the user satisfactions.

Flex is...as fun as roller coaster experience, something never happen in other development!

comments.author: Raul Riera
comments.message: For me the best thiing about Flex is how easy Adobe made it possible to create Flash Applications, now we have the tools to take away that awful undeserved name of "skip-intro" applications.

comments.author: Sree Kiran
comments.message:
The most significant feature of Flex is customization bcoz instead of just using what is available,u can actually make it look & behave the way u always wanted.Not to forget the custom effects & animation & the reusability of these components.
Ofcourse Flex is a bundle of useful features.

comments.message: I love the features like Skinning and applying styles. The feature of importing skins created using CS3 are awesome!
